text: János Fuzik (10 October 1957 – 7 September 2022) was a Hungarian journalist and politician. He was a member of the . He was a member of the National Assembly from 2014 to 2018. Fuzik died on 7 September 2022, at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian journalists Category:Hungarian politicians
title: János Fuzik
